backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing products and form submissions with filtering, sorting, and retrieval functions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping project features to related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles with OKLCH variable definitions for light and dark themes and global background/text setup.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point defining root container and loading the main React script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app routing setup with TanStack Router, page routes, theme provider, and shared layout.
frontend/src/components/about/ValuesTime: Displays four brand values with icons, titles, and descriptions in a responsive grid.
frontend/src/components/contact/ContactF: Contact form with validation, input fields, and submission via React Query mutation.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Footer with brand info, navigation links, social icons, and Caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Responsive site header with logo, desktop navigation links, and mobile menu toggle.
frontend/src/components/product/ProductG: Displays a main product image with selectable thumbnails and fallback image support.
frontend/src/components/product/SizeSele: Renders selectable size buttons, highlighting the active choice.
frontend/src/components/shop/ProductGrid: Shows a grid of product cards with images, pricing, and a button to view details.
frontend/src/components/shop/ShopFilters: Provides search, category, price range, and sort controls for filtering shop products.
frontend/src/hooks/mutations/useContactM: React Query mutation for submitting contact form data with success and error toasts.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useProductQue: Fetches a single product by ID using an actor, enabling only when ready.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useProductsQu: Retrieves all products from the backend actor when available.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Initializes and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider for Internet Identity handling login, logout, and stored identity loading.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining custom color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point setting up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with sections describing the brand story, craftsmanship, materials, and sustainability, including images and text blocks.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Displays contact information (email, phone, location) and includes a form component for user inquiries.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Provides the homepage layout including a hero section, value propositions, and a featured collection teaser with images and CTA buttons.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailsPage.ts: Fetches and displays detailed product info with gallery, price, description, size selector, and an add-to-cart action with error handling.
frontend/src/pages/ShopPage.tsx: Shows the product catalog with filters, sorting, search, and category selection, fetching items and rendering them in a grid.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS with custom colors, fonts, container settings, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
